source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_00<tab>Serendipity appears to be extremely tired. Perhaps you should inquire as to why.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_00<tab>彫金師ギルドのセレンディピティーは、冒険者に大きな仕事を依頼したいようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_01<tab>A sleep-deprived Serendipity has tasked you with a very important commission, once again for the merchant Roroton. As an attendee to the sultana's nameday celebration, he wishes to present a gift to Her Grace. If his gift meets with her favor, he will rise to even greater prominence in Ul'dahn society. You must craft a high-quality black pearl ring, and then you must meld to it a grade three piety materia. When finished, present the ring to Serendipity.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_01<tab>セレンディピティーから依頼を受けた。ウルダハの彫金師ギルドにいる「セレンディピティー」に「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　5631)) 01 /var>」のついた「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4514)) 01 /var>」を納品しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_02<tab>After Serendipity verifies that you have completed the ring, she summons Roroton to the guild. However, your meeting takes a dramatic turn when Robert bursts in and accuses the merchant of being the Jade Fox. He takes Roroton into custody and departs the guild, though not before seizing your black pearl ring as evidence. Speak with Serendipity and see what she thinks of this unexpected development.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_02<tab>セレンディピティーに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4514)) 01 /var>を納品した。ウルダハの彫金師ギルドにいる「セレンディピティー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_03<tab>Serendipity suddenly realizes that Gigi is nowhere to be found, and begs you to help her find him. She recalls that he was muttering something about Pearl Lane, and suggests that you begin the search for the missing mammet there.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_03<tab>セレンディピティーと話した。ウルダハのパールレーンで「ネジ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_04<tab>You and Serendipity find Gigi in Pearl Lane, along with Robert and Roroton. Gigi accuses the Sultansworn of being an impostor, a claim which Robert does not deny. His identity revealed, the Jade Fox attempts to hold Roroton hostage, but the merchant and mammet manage to subdue the thief. Observing that Gigi has been severely damaged in the struggle, you heroically attempt to repair him by jamming your ring inside him, despite having absolutely no knowledge of mammet construction and no reason to believe it would make a difference. Inexplicably, your efforts appear to meet with some success, as the mammet reactivates and subsequently states how much it dislikes your most recent creation. Return to the guild and discuss all that has transpired with Serendipity.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_04<tab>ネジを探し出した。ウルダハの彫金師ギルドにいる「セレンディピティー」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_05Serendipity explains that your reckless attempt to repair Gigi with your black pearl ring invoked such overwhelming disgust that the mammet, through sheer strength of will, overcame its injuries. She also reveals that Gigi's original name is Mnejing, and that as the first mammet ever built, he served as the basis for all future designs. However, she decides not to divulge this information to the mammet, as it would only serve to inflate his ego even more. Although she appreciates your good intentions, Serendipity politely requests that you not tamper with a mammet's internal mechanisms again─at least until you have gained a cursory knowledge of their workings.

※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity once you have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SEQ_05セレンディピティーに報告した。「狐のジェイド」の正体は、ロバートだった。彼は彫金師ギルドの常連客であるロロトンに罪を着せようとしていたのだ。ネジは、ロバートに壊されてしまったが、冒険者が作ったのおかげで蘇った。ネジが元通り動いたのは、冒険者の作品が、100年前の職人と同じくらい素晴らしいからだとセレンディピティーは言う。彫金は、単なる高価な宝飾品ではなく、人の心を豊かにする「芸術品」である。これからも、その「芸術品」を生み出す腕を磨いていこう。

※以下の条件を満たすと、彫金師ギルドのセレンディピティーから、新たなクラスクエストを受注することができます。
1.「メインクエスト：第七星暦ストーリー」の、
　「希望の灯火」を完了する。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_TODO_00<tab>Present a black pearl ring <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> melded with a piety materia III to Serendipity.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_TODO_00<tab>セレンディピティーに依頼品を納品

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Serendipity.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_TODO_01<tab>セレンディピティーと話す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_TODO_02<tab>Search for Gigi in Pearl Lane.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_TODO_02<tab>パールレーンでネジを探す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Serendipity.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_TODO_03<tab>彫金師ギルドのセレンディピティーと話す

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_001<tab><yawn> Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...<var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((good morning)) ((good evening)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((good evening)) ((good morning)) /var>)) /var>...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_001はああ……ああ、)) (( )) 02 /var>しゃん……
おはようございまぅぅ……。ふあああっ……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_002<tab>Sorry, sorry, it's been a long...wait, what day is it? It's been so busy on account of the sultana's nameday celebration that I haven't had time to get a good night's sleep...or any sleep, for that matter.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_002はうああ、ごめんなしゃい……。
ナナモ様の誕生式典に向けた仕事の追い込みで、
ここ数日、徹夜が続いていたもので……ぐぅ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_003<tab>Don't worry about me, though! I'm fine, see? Perfectly awake! Perfectly fine!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_003っは！　い、いけません！
あやうく意識が飛んでしまうとこでした。
ええ、そうです、え～と……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_004<tab>But seeing you here reminds me that I had a very important commission for you. Roroton wants you to craft a ring─a ring he intends to present to the sultana herself!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_004ロロトンさんから、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんへ
一世一代の大仕事が舞い込みましたよ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_005<tab>This is the sort of opportunity that comes but once in a lifetime. Your jewelry might be worn by Her Royal Majesty Nanamo Ul Namo!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_005なな、なんと、かのウルダハ元首、ナナモ女王陛下が、
誕生式典でお召しになる宝飾品の用立てを
ロロトンさんへ依頼されたとのこと！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_006<tab>You see, at the celebration, all of the sultana's gifts will be presented to her at once in a grand ceremony. Any guest whose gift receives special recognition is assured of great fame and fortune!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_006女王陛下に献上する品を作れるのは
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんだけ！
というわけで、ご指名いただいたわけです。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_007<tab>Roroton was adamant that you be the one to craft his gift. He said he could only accept the work of Ul'dah's <var 1A 02 /var>premier<var 1A 01 /var> goldsmith!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_007並み居る目利きの商人を差し置いて、
ロロトンさんの美を見る「目」が女王陛下に認められた。
……商人にとっての最高の名誉ですよね！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_008<tab>After discussing the matter at length, he decided on a flawless black pearl ring as his present. Additionally, he would like it to be melded with materia as a finishing touch.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_008献上品は、「」をつけた
「」。
漆黒に輝く大粒の真珠をあしらった最高級品です。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_009<tab>I suggest you use a piety materia. That would give the sultana incentive to select it─though we don't want to give the impression she <var 1A 02 /var>needs<var 1A 01 /var> it, so perhaps you should use an average grade, say...three. Given the importance of this commission, Roroton has agreed to pick it up in person, so I will contact him when you have prepared the ring.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_009さあ、最高品質の最高傑作を作ってくださいね！
出来上がったら、ぜひ私に見せてください。
すぐにロロトンさんを、お呼びしますから！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_020<tab>Is the ring ready yet? Remember that it must also be melded with grade three piety materia. Roroton will come as soon as I contact him, and not a moment sooner. He doesn't want to risk upsetting Gigi...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_020ネジの調子が悪いんですが、見てあげる時間もありません……
あっ、それで「」をつけた
「」は作れましたか？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_021<tab>By the Twelve, this is fabulous! I'll let Roroton know at once!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_021わぁ、ついに完成したんですねっ！
今すぐロロトンさんをお呼びしますね！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_022<tab>It's more beautiful than I could have ever imagined! The color, the shape, the luster... This is a ring fit for royalty!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_022黒真珠の輝き、彫金の精巧さ……
どれをとっても、最高の出来栄えでしたっ！
必ずや女王陛下にも、ご満足頂けるでしょう！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_023<tab>I knew I was right to trust in you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This ring will surely meet with Her Grace's approval!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_023ロロトンの人生を賭けた献上品にふさわしい！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんへ依頼して正解でした、
ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_024<tab>Stop right there, Roroton! This mummer's farce ends now!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_024そこまでだッ！　ロロトン！
彫金師ギルドを騙し、まんまとお宝をせしめようったって、
そうは問屋が卸さないぞ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_025<tab>Huh? Wh-What is the meaning of this?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_025い、いったい何のことですか!?
わ、私には何が何だか……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_026<tab>Think you're clever, do you? I've seen through your lies, and I know who you really are─the Jade Fox!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_026とぼけるな！　ロロトン……いや、
お前が「狐のジェイド」だということは、
既にネタがあがってるんだ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_001_026<tab>The Jade Fox!? Roroton, is this true? Have you been deceiving us all this time?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_001_026「狐のジェイド」ですって……！？
ロバートさん、ロロトンさん！
こ、これは……いったい、どういうことですかっ！？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_027<tab>I'm afraid so, my dear. But it's over now, and not a moment too soon. This charlatan was plotting to rob the guests at the nameday celebration─and maybe even the sultana herself!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_027間に合ってよかった。危なかったね、セレンさん。
こいつがギルドに取り入ったのは、詐欺計画の布石なんだ。
「」を盗むための！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_028<tab>Th-That's ridiculous! I don't have to listen to these wild accusations!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_028そ、そんな馬鹿なことが……！
ふざけるなッ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_030<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'm afraid I must ask you to give me that ring, as it is evidence of his crimes. It will be returned to you once his trial is complete.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_030こいつの盗もうとした「」は、
私が銀冑団として、責任を持って王宮に献納しよう。
これが代金だ。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_031<tab>You don't believe him, do you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? I'm innocent, I tell you! Innocent!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_031)) (( )) 02 /var>さんっ！
助けてくださいッ！　私は無実だッ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_032<tab>We'll see how long you can maintain this facade once I've put you in a cell! I'm taking you to Captain Jenlyns!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_032往生際が悪いぞ「狐のジェイド」！
言い訳は銀冑団の詰め所で聞く！
キリキリ歩けっ！

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_033NE※GIGIGI★※...
SeCrEtS aNd LiEs, SeCrEtS aNd LiEs! He TaKeS hIm To DeAtH aNd SoRrOw, To PeArL lAnE!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_033ネジ……ジ……
ヤツ……ガ……ニゲ……ル……
ぱーるれーん……ぱーるれーん……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_040<tab>I still can't believe that Roroton was the Jade Fox! Can you, Gigi?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_040ロロトンさんが、ジェイドだったなんて……
信じられません……。
びっくりしたわね、ネジ……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_041<tab>Gigi? Gigi! Where are you!?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_041……ネジ？
……ネジ！？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_042<tab>Egads, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I think he might have run off on his own!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_042大変です、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
ネジがいないわ！？
そういえば、さっきパールレーンって口走ってたわね……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_043<tab>I heard him muttering something about Pearl Lane. We should try searching for him there first!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_043ひとりで「パールレーン」へ行ってしまったの！？
調子が悪いから、途中で力尽きてしまうかも！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ネジを探してくださいっ！

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_060NE※GIGIGI★※...
SeCrEtS aNd LiEs, SeCrEtS aNd LiEs! BaCk AwAy FrOm ThE lAlAfElL, yOu CuR!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_060ネジジ……オマエ……マガイモノ！　マガイモノ！
ニゲルナ！　コノ　ポンコツ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_061<tab>Well, if it isn't the mammet. You're an awfully long way from home.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_061なんですか、君は。
彫金師ギルドの……魔法人形？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_062<tab>Gigi! What are you doing here!? Why did you run away?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_062ネジ！
な、何があったんですかっ！？
こ、これはいったい！？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_063<tab>DeCeIvEr! TrIcKsTeR! tHiS mAn Is No SuLtAnSwOrN!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_063ネジ……ネジジ……金貨……ニセモノ！
コイツ……ギンチュウダン……ウソ！
ニセモノ！　マガイモノ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_064<tab>What...what are you saying?
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_064<tab>なんですって、ネジッ！？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_065<tab>Robert is the Jade Fox, Mistress Serendipity! Listen to your assistant─you know it to be true!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_065セレンさんっ、真犯人はこいつなんです！
金貨を見たでしょう？　あれは全て贋金だ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_066<tab>Robert! Tell me it isn't so! Tell me this is all a misunderstanding!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_066ええッ！？
ど、どういうことですか？　ロバートさんっ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_067<tab>Everyone, take a deep breath and calm down. There's no reason this needs to end in bloodshed.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_067おッと！　お前ら、動くんじゃねェぞ！
少しでも動いたら、コイツの頭がふっとぶぜ！
熟れたカボチャみてェに、バーンとな！

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_068My gods... It's true...
You really are the Jade Fox, aren't you?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_068ロ、ロバートさん、もしかして……
アナタが……「狐のジェイド」なの……！？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_069<tab>You've an overdeveloped sense of justice, little one. It's going to get you into trouble someday.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_069ちっ、オレの正体を見抜く奴がいるとは……。
まったく……ポンコツ野郎め。抜け目ねェな。
本物を見分ける「目」が、こんな場面で役に立つとはな！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_070<tab>As for you and me, my dear Serendipity─I think we're well past the point of introductions.
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_070<tab>そうさ、俺は「狐のジェイド」……世界一の怪盗よ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_071<tab>Believe me when I say that I'm just as disappointed as you are. I had hoped we would become more intimately acquainted before this identity outlived its usefulness.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_071お前ら彫金師ギルドを騙すのには苦労したぜ。
銀冑団に変装し、なおかつ出入りの商人に罪を着せる。
……なかなか手のこんだ手品だったろ？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_072<tab>Alas, I could not bear to forsake an opportunity of this magnitude─one that Roroton here was kind enough to provide.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_072だが首尾は上々！
お陰で、目の飛び出るぐらいの上物が手に入ったぜ。
苦労して計画を練った甲斐があったってもんだ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_073<tab>
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_073<tab>(CUT)

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_074<tab>
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_074<tab>(CUT)

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_075<tab>NE※GIGIGI★※!!!
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_075<tab>ネジジジジジィィィィッ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_076<tab>Bah! Meddlesome contraption!
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_076<tab>フン、やられるかよ、このポンコツ野郎ッ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_001_077<tab>You son of a─
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_001_077<tab>やあああああああああッ！！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_077<tab>Uggggggh!
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROBERT_000_077<tab>ぐほはッ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_078<tab>Gigi!
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_078<tab>ネジッ！！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_079<tab>SeReNdIpItY...i...I...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_079……ミンナ……無事……
ヨカッタ……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_080<tab>I...dEtEsT...tHaT rIdIcUlOuS...hAiRsTyLe...YoU mUst...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_080せれん……最後ニ……モウ……一度……
尻……触ワ……ラ……セ…………
ロ…………

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_081<tab>Gigi, no!
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_081<tab>ネジィィィーっ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_082<tab>Y-You can fix him, can't you? He saved my life... Do you need money for parts? I'll pay anything. You can even sell the ring I commissioned.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_082セレンさん、お気を確かに。
大丈夫、魔法人形ならすぐに修理できます……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_083<tab>It's not a matter of money. I...I think his core might be irreparably damaged.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_083ダメ……「コア」が損傷している……。
「コア」が失われてしまったら……
もうネジは生き返らない……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_084<tab>It was made over a hundred years ago with techniques that have long since been forgotten. If it has failed, then he is forever lost to us...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_084ネジの「コア」は、百年前に作られた、
「漆黒の真珠」という希少な宝石なの……。
恐らく、もうこのエオルゼアには存在しない宝石……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_085<tab>GIGIIIIIIIII!!!
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_085<tab>ネジいいいいいいいーっ……！！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_086<tab><sniffle> <sob> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? What are you doing with that ring?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_086……こ、これは……！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……
あなたの作った、この「」は……！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_087<tab>Wait, <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>? You can't seriously be suggesting that...
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_087<tab>まさか……「コア」と同じ……「漆黒の真珠」……！？

source:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_088NE※GIGIGI★※...
BlAcK pEaRl RiNg...GaAaH, tHiS iS bY fAr ThE wOrSt PiEcE gReEnHoRn HaS eVeR cRaFtEd. ItS vErY eXiStEnCe OfFeNdS mE. i FeEl ViOlAtEd, So ViOlAtEd!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_GIGI_000_088ネ……ネジジ……
コノ……「」…………全然ダメ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_089<tab>Gigi, you've come back to us! It's...it's a miracle!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_089ネジぃぃっ！　よかったっ……！！
いっしょに、ギルドへ帰りましょう！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_089<tab>I owe you and Gigi my life. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank you! Ah...but shouldn't you return to the guild and see how Mistress Serendipity and her assistant are faring?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_ROROTON_000_089なにからなにまで、ありがとうございました！
これからも、いい装飾品をたくさん作ってくださいね！
ギルドの「セレンさん」にも、よろしくお伝えください。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_090<tab>I still can't believe what has happened... First, I thought Roroton was the Jade Fox, then it turned out it was Robert...
target: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_090<tab>まさかロバートさんが「狐のジェイド」だったなんて……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_091<tab>Gigi must have sensed something strange about him before. I can't help but think back on all those times he ranted about secrets and lies.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_091以前、ネジが「アイツ　ニ　騙サレルナ！」
って言っていたのを覚えていますか？

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_092<tab>I assumed he was speaking of Roroton, but now I realize he meant Robert. Oh, if only I had listened more closely to his words.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_092私はネジの言う「アイツ」は、てっきり
ロロトンさんのことかと思っていました。
でも本当はロバートさんのことを言っていたんですね。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_093<tab>That man made a fool out of me, what with his dashing good looks, his piercing gaze, his broad shoulders...
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_093それにしても、なんて巧妙な計画……
こうして無事、事件が解決したのも、
ネジの本物を見抜く「目」のお陰です。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_094<tab>But we got him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! He'll never again terrorize the good people of Ul'dah!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_094そして、死んでしまった彼が生き返ったのは、
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの作った
「」のお陰……。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_095<tab>I'm sure you're worried about Gigi. Allow me to put your fears to rest: in spite of your reckless attempt to repair him, there was no permanent damage.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_095魔法人形であるネジは、
18代前のギルドマスター「ガルディナス」が、
100年ほど前に創り上げたものです。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_096<tab>Indeed, when you began fumbling around with his components and attempted to shove that ring inside him, I was absolutely terrified! Thankfully, through sheer strength of will, Gigi overcame his injuries. And it's all thanks to your ring.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_096その細工は精巧を極め、
特に「コア」には、古来から生命力を宿すという
さまざまな宝石類が用いられています。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_097<tab>In Gigi's eyes, your ring was so poorly wrought that it filled him with an overwhelming disgust. You reminded him of his purpose by creating focus for his grand disdain, and in so doing you helped him to regain his senses! Isn't that wonderful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_097きっと、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの作った
は、
ネジの生みの親にも負けない作品だったのですね。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_098<tab>Ah, but that's not all I wanted to tell you. When I was examining Gigi earlier, I discovered something extraordinary!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_098彫金は、単なる高価な宝飾品というだけでなく、
人の心を豊かにする「芸術品」です。
そのことを、今回の事件で改めて再認識しました。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_099<tab>You see, he's by far the oldest mammet we have here, having been constructed by one of our former guildmasters over a century ago. In fact, I'm the nineteenth guildmaster he has assisted, according to records.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_099あ、そうそう、驚くべき発見をしたんです。
壊れたコアの内側に記された銘から、
なんと、ネジの本名が判明したんです！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_100<tab>But what our records didn't contain was his original name, which was so faintly inscribed upon his core that it went unnoticed until now. Gigi is <var 1A 02 /var>Mnejing<var 1A 01 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the first mammet ever built, and the mammet whose design on which all others are based!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_100その名は「メネジン」……失われた一番最初の魔法人形。
全ての魔法人形の原型となったオリジナル。
それこそがネジだったんです！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_101<tab>Of course, I have no intention of telling him. The knowledge would make him insufferably arrogant.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_101……だからって、
「オシリ　ヲ　触ラセロ」って言われても
絶対にお断りですけどねっ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_102<tab>Anyway, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, please accept my sincerest thanks. And though Gigi would be loath to admit it, I'm sure deep down he's grateful to you as well. Oh, in the future, please don't attempt to repair a mammet until you have at least learned the basics of their construction!
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SERENDIPITY_000_102ともあれ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
本っ当に、どうもありがとうございましたっ！
ネジの分まで、お礼を申し上げますっ！

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>This concludes the goldsmith quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SYSTEM_000_500「彫金師」の物語が、ひとつの区切りを迎えました！
次の「彫金師」のクラスクエストを開始するためには、
以下の条件を満たす必要があります。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SYSTEM_000_5011.「メインクエスト：第七星暦ストーリー」の、
　「希望の灯火」を完了する。

source: TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Once you have done so, the next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity.
target:
TEXT_CLSGLD500_00658_SYSTEM_000_502条件を満たし、彫金師ギルドの、
「セレンディピティー」に話しかけ、
新たなクラスクエストを開始しましょう！
